item.title: Yamila add a quote by Homer's Odyssey by Gwen Cooper
item.description: "Songs of Songs: Ani l'dodi v'dodi li" (I'm my beloved's, and my beloved is mine)" -- Homer's Odyssey by Gwen Cooper

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Richard Paul Evans
item.description: "Magna est veritas, et praevalebit: truth is mighty, and will prevail" -- Richard Paul Evans

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Richard Paul Evans
item.description: "We are chained to that which we do not forgive" -- Richard Paul Evans

item.title: Yamila add a quote by John Johnson
item.description: "....I'd skimmed along life like a surfer, mistaking speed for direction. I'd feigned to be pressing forward when I was really running away" -- John Johnson

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Yamila add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde
